Ask me about…
I am still passionate about many topics from my former educational settings. Feel free to reach out, if you want to know more about the following issues in a more casual manner:

The role of colonial medical establishments in the history of sexuality
Homonationalism and its downfall in CEE
Ambivalent sexism theory: why benevolent sexism is not better
Homophobia and national identity in contemporary Russia
